title: Bandicam 1.9.3.492
description:
Operating system: Windows 2000, 2003, XP, Vista, 7/8 (Support for 32-bit and 64-bit)
Version: Bandicam 1.9.3.492 - 01/21/2014
Related codec: Bandisoft MPEG-1 decoder
Website: http://www.bandicam.com/

You need WinRAR v5.01 for this torrent: http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm

Instructions:
1. Install Bandicam(close Bandicam if it is run after the installation)
2. Run "Bandicam Register.exe" as administrator(your antivirus might say its a virus, but it isn't)
3. Enter an email address(anything can be entered) and click "Register application!"
4. Now run Bandicam and record! :)

Note:
If you get an error saying "Invalid application", reinstall Bandicam and use "Bandicam Register.exe" again.
You don't have to download constantly a new torrent when an update is out, just download the installer from the main website and use the "Bandicam Register.exe" afterwards.
